original_text: For the Son of Man is going to come in his Father’s glory with his angels, and then he will reward each person according to what they have done.
korean_text: 인자가 아버지의 영광으로 그 천사들과 함께 오리니 그 때에 각 사람이 행한 대로 갚으리라

sentences.original_text: For the Son of Man is going to come
and then he will reward each person
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 때 그는 각 사람에게 상을 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: according to what they have done
